sentences.cn: 一大堆眼花缭乱的选择

sentences.en: A dazzling array of celebrities are expected at the Mayfair gallery to see the pictures.
sentences.cn: 梅费尔美术馆期待星光璀璨的各界名流来欣赏这些画。

sentences.en: A glance along his bookshelves reveals a bewildering array of interests.
sentences.cn: 看一眼他的书架就知道他兴趣繁杂。

sentences.en: a vast array of bottles of different shapes and sizes
sentences.cn: 一大批形状大小不一的瓶子

sentences.en: As the deadline approached she experienced a bewildering array of emotions.
sentences.cn: 随着最后期限的临近，她开始心绪纷乱，不知所措。

sentences.en: He was unable to escape the array of facts.
sentences.cn: 他无法躲避一连串的事实.

sentences.en: I was confronted with an array of knobs, levers, and switches.
sentences.cn: 我面对的是一大堆旋钮、控制杆和开关。

sentences.en: I was constantly ill, with a baffling array of symptoms.
sentences.cn: 我一直病着，出现了一系列让人不解的症状。

sentences.en: make-up arrayed on the bathroom counter
sentences.cn: 盥洗台上摆放整齐的化妆品

sentences.en: One is dazzled by the endless array of beautiful exhibits.
sentences.cn: 展品琳琅满目,美不胜收.

sentences.en: She puts on her finest array.
The image is then stored on the computer hard disk as a vast array of black or white dots.
sentences.cn: 这幅图像当时就以大量黑点或白点排列的形式被存入电脑硬盘。

sentences.en: The store had quite an array of leather shoes in stock.
sentences.cn: 这个商店有相当一批皮鞋现货.

sentences.en: The troops are in gallant array.
There was an impressive array of pill bottles stacked on top of the fridge.
sentences.cn: 冰箱上显眼地摆放着许多药瓶。

sentences.en: There's a glittering array of glass to choose from at markets.
sentences.cn: 市场上有很多晶莹闪亮的玻璃制品可供挑选。

sentences.en: Visitors can view a rich and colorful array of aquatic plants and animals.
sentences.cn: 游客们可以看到一系列各种各样、色彩斑斓的水生动植物。

sentences.en: We visited the local markets and saw wonderful arrays of fruit and vegetables.
sentences.cn: 我们参观了当地的市场，看到了漂亮地摆放着的水果蔬菜。

phrases.tran_cn: 探测器阵列；检波器组合
(军队)列成战阵的，进入战斗序列的
一维数组；线性排列；[电磁]直线天线阵
感测器阵列；阵列传感器
太阳能电池阵；太阳电池板；太阳组

trans.tran_en: a set of numbers or signs, or of computer memory units, arranged in lines across or down
a set of numbers or signs, or of computer memory units, arranged in lines across or down
to arrange something in an attractive way

trans.tran_cn: 排列， 配置； 打扮， 装饰
trans.tran_en: to arrange something in an attractive way
